description: A practical 28-day muscle-building plan using just 16 base recipes in smart rotation. Designed for batch cooking: prep proteins and carbs on Sunday, assemble meals during the week. Targets 1.8g protein per kg bodyweight for an 80kg individual. Based on ISSN position stand recommendations for protein timing and distribution (Kerksick et al., 2017; Jäger et al., 2017). Post-workout meals emphasize fast-digesting protein + carbohydrates within 30 minutes of training.
recipe_list: Chicken Thighs with Rice & Roast Veg
Pork Loin with Quinoa & Roast Veg

sunday_prep: Cook 1.5kg brown rice or quinoa (portions for 4-5 lunches/dinners)
Bake 8-10 chicken thighs or 700g+ chicken breast
Wash and chop vegetables for the week
Cook 400g black beans or open canned
wednesday_refresh: Cook fresh batch of rice/quinoa if running low
Prep additional protein (salmon, steak) for Thu-Sun

daily_effort.dinner: 15-20 min (cook protein fresh, use prepped sides)

scaling_notes: Scale all 'scalable: true' ingredients proportionally. For different bodyweights, adjust protein to 1.6-2.2g/kg. Primary scaling levers: protein portions and carb sources (rice, pasta, potato, oats). Post-workout meals should maintain ~2:1 carb:protein ratio when scaled.

instructions: Cook oats with milk 4-5 min. Stir in whey.
Top with banana and almonds.
MEAL PREP: Portion dry oats + whey into containers for the week.
Bake chicken at 200°C 22 min. Cook rice in bulk. Steam broccoli.
BATCH COOK: Make 4 portions on Sunday.
VARIATION: Swap broccoli for green beans or asparagus.
Blend all until smooth. Drink within 30 min post-workout.
VARIATION: Swap banana for berries. Add 15g PB for extra calories.
Grill steak 3-4 min per side. Bake potato 200°C 35 min.
Steam broccoli. Rest steak 5 min before slicing.
VARIATION: Swap potato for sweet potato.
Cook oats with milk 4-5 min. Stir in whey.
Top with banana and almonds.
MEAL PREP: Portion dry oats + whey into containers for the week.
Brown beef in oil. Cook quinoa in bulk. Sauté veg.
BATCH COOK: Brown 700g+ beef, portion for 4 days.
VARIATION: Swap beef for ground turkey.
Spread PB on rice cakes. Top with banana and honey.

meals.meal_name: Chicken Thighs with Rice & Roast Veg
instructions: Roast chicken at 200°C 25-30 min. Cook rice. Roast carrots, steam beans.
BATCH COOK: Roast full tray (8-10 pieces). Portion for 3-4 dinners.
Cook oats with milk 4-5 min. Stir in whey.
Top with banana and almonds.
MEAL PREP: Portion dry oats + whey into containers for the week.
Bake chicken at 200°C 22 min. Cook rice in bulk. Steam broccoli.
BATCH COOK: Make 4 portions on Sunday.
VARIATION: Swap broccoli for green beans or asparagus.
Blend all until smooth. Drink within 30 min post-workout.
VARIATION: Swap banana for berries. Add 15g PB for extra calories.
Bake salmon 200°C 12-15 min. Cook pasta, steam broccoli.
Flake salmon over pasta, drizzle oil.
VARIATION: Swap salmon for tuna. Add spinach or cherry tomatoes.
Cook oats with milk 4-5 min. Stir in whey.
Top with banana and almonds.
MEAL PREP: Portion dry oats + whey into containers for the week.
Brown turkey in oil. Cook pasta. Toss with sauce and parmesan.
BATCH COOK: Cook 700g+ turkey and full box pasta. Portion for 4 days.
Slice banana over cottage cheese. Sprinkle oats and honey.
Stir-fry steak in oil 3-4 min. Warm rice and beans.
Bowl: rice, beans, steak, tomato, avocado.
BATCH COOK: Cook rice and beans in bulk.
Cook oats with milk 4-5 min. Stir in whey.
Top with banana and almonds.
MEAL PREP: Portion dry oats + whey into containers for the week.
Bake chicken at 200°C 22 min. Cook rice in bulk. Steam broccoli.
BATCH COOK: Make 4 portions on Sunday.
VARIATION: Swap broccoli for green beans or asparagus.
Blend all until smooth. Drink within 30 min post-workout.
VARIATION: Swap banana for berries. Add 15g PB for extra calories.

meals.meal_name: Pork Loin with Quinoa & Roast Veg
instructions: Sear pork 3 min per side, bake 190°C 15 min.
Cook quinoa, roast sweet potato and asparagus.
BATCH COOK: Cook 2-3 pork loins at once.
Cook oats with milk. Sauté spinach in oil, scramble eggs.
Toast bread. Serve oats + eggs + banana.
VARIATION: Swap spinach for mushrooms.
